name: Champions Leek
description:
Concept

Keep the Leek in frame while trying to slow down or push other players out of the frame ( side scrolling game)

Background story:

After the Fukushima accident in japan a close by Leek farmer returns home after the area has been deemed Stable and safe. Something will never be the same though. One of his Leeks are now radioactive and ALIVE!!!
It is floating around and leaking some kind of goo and seem to have develop a consciousness. With life and thoughts so many questions need answers, such what is out there and who am I? And how fast and fare can I get!
Help the Leek find answers to these questions help it become the champion Leek!

Note! This game is build for mobile devices, and will therefore need be built to an android using the SD. Furthermore it needs a Google Chrome Cast.
